thread.title: BRIEF-A. Schulman Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.12

title: BRIEF-A. Schulman Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.12
text:
March 28, 2018 / 8:22 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-A. Schulman Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.12 Reuters Staff 
March 28 (Reuters) - A Schulman Inc: * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.12 
* Q2 SALES $650.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $643.1 MILLION 
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.35 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* ACQUISITION BY LYONDELLBASELL IS EXPECTED TO CLOSE IN SECOND HALF OF CALENDAR YEAR 2018 
* IN Q2 AS A RESULT OF U.S. TAX REFORM RECORDED DISCRETE NON-CASH TAX BENEFIT OF $6.8 MILLION 
* ‍IN LIGHT OF PENDING MERGER WITH LYONDELLBASELL, COMPANY HAS SUSPENDED ITS FISCAL 2018 GUIDANCE​ 
* IN LIGHT OF PENDING MERGER, COMPANY HAS SUSPENDED ITS FISCAL 2018 GUIDANCE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
